definition: A term used to describe something that transcends time, remaining relevant and meaningful regardless of the era or period it is in. It is often used to describe artistic works, designs, or styles that possess a timeless quality, unaffected by changing trends or fashions.

examples.english: The timeless elegance of the design

examples.german: Ein zeitloses Geschenk für jeden Anlass
examples.english: A timeless gift for any occasion
